items.title: Spring Wedding Cake
items.fullDescription: A two-tier almond olive oil wedding cake with white chocolate pistachio ganache and blood orange jam, finished with fresh flowers.

items.title: Volkshotel Art Market Cakes
items.fullDescription: A collection of apricot ricotta cakes filled with salted pistachio cream and raspberries, cakes finished with shiny whimsical buttercream, topped with flowers. Sold (out!) at the Volkshotel Art Market.

items.title: Bon Iver Salmon Cake
items.fullDescription: A sculptural cake created for a Kometen Brood Café and Bon Iver collaboration. Modelled like a life-size salmon with handcarved details.

items.title: Slaymantha's ADE cake
items.fullDescription: A colorful birthday/ADE cake for DJ and soundartist Slimfit (also known as 'Slaymantha'). An orangeblossom olive oil cake filled with rosé poached quinces and a saffron buttercream.

items.title: Petal Textured Cake
items.fullDescription: Every girls dream: a pistachio and strawberry cake. Covered in a yellow vanilla buttercream and dusted with freeze dried raspberry powder. The perfect cake for the 21st birthday dinner of my best friend, Zosha.

items.title: Ewok! (My dog)
items.fullDescription: A cake I made for my sisters high school graduation, it is my 14 year old dog, Ewok. He lost most of his teeth.

items.title: Kian's First Birthday
items.fullDescription: A classic 'slagroomtaart' done my way. Kians name is both written in Dutch and Farsi.

items.title: Spaghetti
items.fullDescription: A birthday cake with a berry pistachio financier, matcha ganache, ricotta and a blackberry coulis. The decoration comes from pasta and fungi forms. Eclectic, CAMP!
